name: 顾哥哥Belfort:)
greetingText: I feel really cheerful when calling you 顾哥哥btw!
wishText: May all the happiness be with you：)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!!! May this love and happiness always be with you
text2: May all your wishes come true.
text3: May forture and success follow you wherever you go.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Thank you for being the wonderful person that you are.
replayText: I'm so lucky to have you in my life. Let's make the life more amazing together
